{"id":"HD-1341","entityId":"94-6391","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"HD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1341"},{"name":"summary","value":"WALLSTREET-MITTE - group supermaid ne vidi status pogleda na webu"},{"name":"description","value":"

Če se vpišem z apk na webu z supermaid potem ne vidim status pogleda.

Prosim, če se preveri in uredi.

"},{"name":"created","value":"1520247694990"},{"name":"updated","value":"1520339585765"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"neza"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"neza"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"neza"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"neza"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Submitted"],"valueId":["Submitted"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Ronzy","fullName":"Robert Tajnšek"}]},{"name":"Sprint","value":["Mrzlina"],"valueId":["Mrzlina"],"color":null},{"name":"Domena","value":["wallstreet-mitte"],"valueId":["wallstreet-mitte"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"115-2314","url":"http://youtrack.creatriks.si:8080/_persistent/image.png?file=115-2314&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"109-2921","author":"neza","authorFullName":"neza","issueId":"HD-1341","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

ENAKO: Maistra - supermaid ne vidi status pogleda sob

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520339585766,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"HD-1339","entityId":"94-6387","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"HD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1339"},{"name":"summary","value":"AMINESS - uklonitev atributa arrival"},{"name":"description","value":"

V hotelu Aminess po polnoči recepcija ročno doda atribute arrival na vse sobe, ki so ta dan na prihodu.

Sedaj pa se je pojavila težava, da ko recepcija v MISH dopoldne naredi check out, ta atribut arrival izgine in potem sobarice več ne vidijo dejanskih sob na prihodu. (simbola za prihod ni več).

Dodatna razlaga:

Simbol za arrival (ki ga ročno naklika nočni receptor na vse sobe, ki so na prihodu) izgine na sobah, ki so ta dan tudi na odhodu (torej departure in arrival).
Izgine, ko se naredi na tej sobi check out (uklonimo atribut arrival). Soba je nato samo kot checked out in simbol za arrival se izgubi.

Potrebno je preveriti in popraviti, da atribut arrival ostane na vseh sobah. Ne sme izginiti ko je soba checked out.

"},{"name":"created","value":"1520244308865"},{"name":"updated","value":"1520327180503"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"neza"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"neza"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"neza"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"neza"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"2"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Submitted"],"valueId":["Submitted"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Ronzy","fullName":"Robert Tajnšek"}]},{"name":"Domena","value":["aminess"],"valueId":["aminess"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"unnamed.png","id":"115-2313","url":"http://youtrack.creatriks.si:8080/_persistent/unnamed.png?file=115-2313&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"109-2916","author":"aljaz86","authorFullName":"Aljaz Ketis","issueId":"HD-1339","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Torej njim so pomembni prihodi za tisti dan a ne? Saj to vidijo po tem katere sobe imajo človečka v belem robu. Imamo pa tudi filter "vsi prihodi", ki ti pokaže vse današnje prihode
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520275286105,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"replies":[]},{"id":"109-2920","author":"neza","authorFullName":"neza","issueId":"HD-1339","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Simbol za arrival (ki ga ročno naklika nočni receptor na vse sobe, ki so na prihodu) izgine na sobah, ki so ta dan tudi na odhodu (torej departure in arrival).
Izgine, ko se naredi na tej sobi check out (uklonimo atribut arrival). Soba je nato samo kot checked out in simbol za arrival se izgubi.

Potrebno je preveriti in popraviti, da atribut arrival ostane na vseh sobah. Ne sme izginiti ko je soba checked out.

cleannes"},{"name":"description","value":"
V določenih primerih pride do napake pri zapisuvanju čistoče v Opero in dobimo v odgovoru "The operation has timed". Potrebno je takšne primere zaznati in jih poslati ponovno. Primer v tabeli in_commits od palace_resorts z it =145441. Teh primerov je več na dan.
"},{"name":"created","value":"1515399396482"},{"name":"updated","value":"1520280638109"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"aljaz86"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Aljaz Ketis"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"aljaz86"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Aljaz Ketis"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"F-1075","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Submitted"],"valueId":["Submitted"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Ronzy","fullName":"Robert Tajnšek"}]},{"name":"Estimation","value":["240"],"valueId":["4h"],"color":null},{"name":"Domena","value":["palace-resorts"],"valueId":["palace-resorts"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"HD-1337","entityId":"94-6383","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"HD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1337"},{"name":"summary","value":"Hit gorica: napačen status sobe"},{"name":"description","value":"

Na ROSu sta v sobi prijavljena dva gosta od 2.3.2018 do 5.3.2018. Na Facility pa so prijavljeni trije gosti, ker je prijavljena še Jana Jakin Petejan od 16.1.2018 do 4.3.2018. Receptorka mi je povedala, da te gostje v sobi ni, in je tudi nima prijavljene, zato je ne more odjaviti.

Torej soba v Flex je bila na odhodu, morala pa bi biti stayover 2 gosta do 5.3.

Status sem ročno popravila na stayover.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520275848175,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"HD-1343","entityId":"94-6397","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"HD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1343"},{"name":"summary","value":"MAISTRA - Eden, soba 361"},{"name":"description","value":"

Hotel EDEN
4.3.2018
soba 361
LaserLine

Melita pravi, da so gosta z id 6756201821 checkinali že v nedeljo 4.3.2018 in da nikakor niso mogli prenesti podatka iz LL v Facility.
Pri nas je vidno da od checkouta v nedeljo ob 12:01 nismo prejeli nobene PMS spremembe na Overview all event.
Med prejetimi podatki v bazi pa je podatek, da so naredili check in novega gosta 4.3. ob 15:20 (spodaj na sliki).

    "object_id": 21,
    "room_id": 361,
    "arrival_date": "2018-03-04",
    "departure_date": "2018-03-07",
    "check_in_timestamp": "2018-03-04 15:20:52",
    "check_out_timestamp": "",
    "out_of_order": false,
    "out_of_order_message": "",
    "room_status": 2,
    "guests": "6756201821;GOGIC GORAN;-;",
    "date_next_arrival": "",
    "next_arrival_guests": ""

Pravi, da so v LL poskušali 3x narediti check in, da bi se prenesel v Facility pa se ni. Poskus je uspel šele danes.
Prosim, če se preveri zakaj nismo obdelali tega podatka in pravilno prikazali v Fac.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520273637884,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"HD-1265","entityId":"94-5952","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"HD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1265"},{"name":"summary","value":"Moja opravila"},{"name":"description","value":"

Baje je bilo pred posodobitvijo tako, da če se je poslalo opravilo na skupino uporabnikov, da so potem vsi te uporabniki na androidu imeli to nalogo pod moja opravila, sedaj pa je na nedokončanih in jih to zelo moti. Torej vsem ki je nek assignment dodeljen mora it na zavihek moja opravila.

Ni možno stestirati, ker ob klik dodelitev taska, se ta zacikla.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1517404179552,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"replies":[]},{"id":"109-2616","author":"anze","authorFullName":"Anze Volovsek","issueId":"HD-1265","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Dodelitev taska ne dela, če se ne izbere sobo na katero je task vezan, čepravj je zaposleni izbran.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1517407100706,"updated":1517404179374,"permittedGroup":null,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"F-1164","entityId":"94-6399","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"F"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1164"},{"name":"summary","value":"Combine functionality for DB sync and creation"},{"name":"description","value":"

DEV

BE: feature/create_db_optim from develop

The idea is to merge DB synchronization and DB creation scripts on the idea “creation and insertion SQL queries to be kept in one file”, with additional methods or changes of the old ones, for execution of these features.
The URLs that I have to test upon are found on endpoints of the CRON system. The testing can be done with writing of this few scripts in the command prompt
From what I understood both these functionalities ( creation and insertion) are done through the CRON endpoints ( routes of cron/(:any) ), but we can execute them through the Docker container CLI.

Tasks:

  • create a new controller named ./applicaton/controllers/cli.php which extends CI_Controller
  • add a new route to ./application/config/routes.php
  • create a new function called create_facility_db which excepts parameters trough getopt() (you can check the current implementation in ./application/sql/tools/create_new_showcase_db.php). The arguments to accept should be:
    • database_name: name of the database to be created
    • db_server: the server on which the database should be created. You can get the list of servers in ./application/config/{ENVIRONMENT}/$database.php
  • when you run that function the end result should be a new database with all the tables, triggers, functions and procedures that are needed for the facility environment (same result if you run php index.php application/sql/tools/create_new_facility_db.php)
  • on each ./application/libraries/api/synchronizer/*.php file you should add a createTable and insertItems function. The createTable function executes the CREATE TABLE query. The create query needs to be copies from the relevant ./application/sql/tools/new_db_helpers/*.php file (files have the same names). The same applies for the insert items

Helpers

Access the PHP container (that runs on ubuntu) to gain access to the php cli interpreter

docker exec -it facility_php bash

Process cli fuction with the PHP interpreter and send through all important arguments (realm, integration type, type of client)

php index.php cli create_facility_db --database facility_test -s 1

"},{"name":"created","value":"1520263112889"},{"name":"updated","value":"1520265977516"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Ronzy"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Robert Tajnšek"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Ronzy"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Robert Tajnšek"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Submitted"],"valueId":["Submitted"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"vlatko","fullName":"vlatko"}]},{"name":"Sprint","value":["Mrzlina"],"valueId":["Mrzlina"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"AC-188","entityId":"94-6395","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"AC"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"188"},{"name":"summary","value":"Change data structure in realm config json"},{"name":"description","value":"

Change structure from

 "background_actions": [
        {
            "action": "set_prefs",
            "data": {
                "prefs": [
                    {
                        "key": "pref_api_url",
                        "type": "string",
                        "value": "facilityforhotels.com/api/v2"
                    },
                    {
                        "key": "pref_realm_logo_url",
                        "type": "string",
                        "value": "https://facilityforhotels.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/solutions-icon-1.png"
                    },
                    {
                        "key": "pref_realm",
                        "type": "string",
                        "value": "dev-ios2"
                    },

            }
        }
    ]

To this

 "background_actions": [
        {
            "action": "set_prefs",
            "data": {
                    "url": "facilityforhotels.com/api/v2"
                    "icon": "https://facilityforhotels.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/solutions-icon-1.png"
                    "realm": "dev-ios2"
            }
        }
    ]
